p: An independent Date Safety and Monitoring Board watches over the ethics of conducting the study in accordance with the declaration of Helsinki, monitors safety parameters and the overall conduct of the study. The DSMB is composed of three independent individuals (Dr. MGW Dijkgraaf, Dr. MCA MÃ¼ller, Prof. Dr. JJ Zwaginga). The DSMB will meet by conference calls. The first took place before the first inclusion. Subsequent to this meeting the DSMB will meet approximately every 6 months. Also, a meeting will be scheduled after half of the total number of patients are enrolled.
